articles.title: Secretariat wins 'virtual' Kentucky Derby - Racenet
articles.description: Secretariat has won the virtual Kentucky Derby against 12 fellow Triple Crown winners, 47 years after the chestnut colt won the real race at Churchill Downs.
articles.content:

articles.title: Victorian men hit with corruption charges over alleged esports match fixing - ABC News
articles.description: Five men are charged with match fixing offences — some of which carry penalties of up to 10 years in jail — as part of the first Australian criminal investigation into esports.
articles.content:

articles.author: Sam Phillips
articles.title: Storm forced to make base in NSW after training request denied - The Age
articles.description: Craig Bellamy's side are poised to set up camp across the NSW border in Albury or Mulwala after the Victorian government denied them permission to train in their home state.
articles.content:
The Storm are set to decamp to NSW for the foreseeable future after the Victorian state government denied their request to train in Melbourne.
